steps.title: Use Wowcher's live chat function for an immediate answer.
steps.content: Use Wowcher's live chat function for an immediate answer. If you need help with an order or are having trouble with the Wowcher site, start a live chat with one of their advisors to get your question answered right away. These advisors are available from 8:00 am to 5:30 pm GMT Monday to Friday and from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm GMT on Saturdays. [1] X Research source Use Live Chat if you have specific account or payment questions so that you can give them your information privately.

steps.title: Ask Wowcher a question on Twitter to get an answer that same day.
steps.content: Ask Wowcher a question on Twitter to get an answer that same day. Although you can’t send their Twitter account a direct message unless they are following you, you can tag @Wowcher_Support in a Tweet directly to ask them a question. They will respond to your tweet any time between 8:00 am and 4:30 pm GMT Monday through Friday. [2] X Research source To follow their support Twitter account, visit https://twitter.com/wowcher_support Never put any personal account information or passwords in your public Tweet.

steps.title: Send a message on Facebook for non-urgent inquiries.
steps.content: Send a message on Facebook for non-urgent inquiries. Visit the Wowcher Support Facebook page and click on “Send Message” to write out your question. Your conversation is private and will be answered between 8:00 am and 4:30 pm GMT Monday through Friday. [3] X Research source You can find the Wowcher Support Facebook page by visiting https://www.facebook.com/wowchercouk/

steps.title: Check the FAQs on their website if you can't speak to a person.
steps.content: Check the FAQs on their website if you can't speak to a person. If you have a question after hours or on a Sunday, try checking the frequently asked questions page, or FAQs, to see if your question has already been answered by Wowcher. You can search for your question directly or look through the forums to find what you are looking for. [4] X Research source To look through the FAQs, visit https://help.wowcher.co.uk/knowledgebase/s/ If your question isn’t answered in the FAQs, try asking it on Twitter, Facebook, or messaging a help advisor on Wowcher during normal business hours.

steps.title: Use Wowcher's website form to get in touch about working with them.
steps.content: Use Wowcher's website form to get in touch about working with them. If you’d like to get your product on Wowcher’s website, fill out their merchant form to submit your product. Provide your company name, registration number, and the details about your product and wait for a reply from their sales team. [5] X Research source You can find Wowcher’s merchant form by visiting https://www.wowcher.co.uk/page/businessfaq

steps.title: Send press-related questions via email to press@wowcher.co.uk.
steps.content: Send press-related questions via email to press@wowcher.co.uk. If you have questions for the marketing or advertising team of Wowcher or you’d like to contact a spokesperson for the company, you can send their press department a direct email. You should only use this email if you are asking about press-related questions, not general questions or information. [6] X Research source Send your press-related email to press@wowcher.co.uk

steps.title: Mail documents to Wowcher’s physical location.
steps.content: Mail documents to Wowcher’s physical location. If you need to submit documents to Wowcher for business or merchant opportunities and you can’t do it online, you can mail them to their headquarters instead. Be sure to include a return address in case Wowcher needs to contact you again. [7] X Research source Send your letter to Wowcher, Pentagon House, Sir Frank Whittle Road, Derby DE21 4XA.
